comment: There is no penalty, but, as Foursquare shares all data about location, there is no way to retain those resources.  There is also no way to retain badges earned after exit. Users may retain coupons etc.

You can exit without penalty, but you cannot keep the resouces, such as the ability to produce geo-data by checking-in, etc. You also lose the ability to access the data produced by your FourSquare friends.
